title: KFC font (not the old one)
content:
Any chance somebody can give a positive id on this font?   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130628041024im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/8411.gif)
author: hyoomen

comments.content:
it's probably custom, but Friz Quadrata   
Bold Italic is a nearby neighbor.   
   
 [www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/friz-quadrata/bold-italic/charmap.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130628041024/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/friz-quadrata/bold-italic/charmap.html)   
   
bj
